TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit StreamConfigurationMap extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: Immutable class to store the available stream CameraCharacteristics#SCALER_STREAM_CONFIGURATION_MAP configurations to set up android.view.Surface Surfaces for creating a android.hardware.camera2.CameraCaptureSession capture session with android.hardware.camera2.CameraDevice#createCaptureSession.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Android.Util.Size[] GetHighResolutionOutputSizes(int32 format) cil managed

Docs.summary: Get a list of supported high resolution sizes, which cannot operate at full BURST_CAPTURE rate.
Docs.returns: an array of supported slower high-resolution sizes, or null if the BURST_CAPTURE capability is not supported

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Android.Util.Range[] GetHighSpeedVideoFpsRanges() cil managed

Docs.summary: Get a list of supported high speed video recording FPS ranges.
Docs.returns: an array of supported high speed video recording FPS ranges The upper bound of returned ranges is guaranteed to be larger or equal to 120.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Android.Util.Range[] GetHighSpeedVideoFpsRangesFor(class Android.Util.Size size) cil managed

Docs.param: one of the sizes returned by #getHighSpeedVideoSizes()
Docs.summary: Get the frame per second ranges (fpsMin, fpsMax) for input high speed video size.
Docs.returns: an array of supported high speed video recording FPS ranges The upper bound of returned ranges is guaranteed to be greater than or equal to 120.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if input size does not exist in the return value of getHighSpeedVideoSizes

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Android.Util.Size[] GetHighSpeedVideoSizes() cil managed

Docs.summary: Get a list of supported high speed video recording sizes.
Docs.returns: an array of supported high speed video recording sizes

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Android.Util.Size[] GetHighSpeedVideoSizesFor(class Android.Util.Range fpsRange) cil managed

Docs.param: one of the FPS range returned by #getHighSpeedVideoFpsRanges()
Docs.summary: Get the supported video sizes for an input high speed FPS range.
Docs.returns: An array of video sizes to create high speed capture sessions for high speed streaming use cases.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32[] GetInputFormats() cil managed

Docs.summary: Get the image format input formats in this stream configuration.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Android.Util.Size[] GetInputSizes(int32 format) cil managed

Docs.summary: Get the supported input sizes for this input format.
Docs.returns: a non-empty array of sizes, or null if the format was not available.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32[] GetOutputFormats() cil managed

Docs.summary: Get the image format output formats in this stream configuration.

MemberSignature.Value: public long GetOutputMinFrameDuration (Java.Lang.Class? klass, Android.Util.Size? size);
.method public hidebysig instance int64 GetOutputMinFrameDuration(class Java.Lang.Class klass, class Android.Util.Size size) cil managed

Docs.param: a class which is supported by #isOutputSupportedFor(Class) and has a non-empty array returned by #getOutputSizes(Class)
Docs.summary: Get the minimum CaptureRequest#SENSOR_FRAME_DURATION frame duration for the class/size combination (in nanoseconds).
Docs.returns: a minimum frame duration > 0 in nanoseconds, or 0 if the minimum frame duration is not available.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public long GetOutputMinFrameDuration (int format, Android.Util.Size? size);
.method public hidebysig instance int64 GetOutputMinFrameDuration(int32 format, class Android.Util.Size size) cil managed

Docs.param: an image format from ImageFormat or PixelFormat
Docs.summary: Get the minimum CaptureRequest#SENSOR_FRAME_DURATION frame duration for the format/size combination (in nanoseconds).
Docs.returns: a minimum frame duration > 0 in nanoseconds, or 0 if the minimum frame duration is not available.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if format or size was not supported

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Android.Util.Size[] GetOutputSizes(class Java.Lang.Class klass) cil managed

Docs.summary: Get a list of sizes compatible with klass to use as an output.
Docs.returns: an array of supported sizes for ImageFormat#PRIVATE format, or null iff the klass is not a supported output.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Android.Util.Size[] GetOutputSizes(int32 format) cil managed

Docs.param: an image format from ImageFormat or PixelFormat
Docs.summary: Get a list of sizes compatible with the requested image format.
Docs.returns: an array of supported sizes, or null if the format is not a supported output

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public long GetOutputStallDuration (Java.Lang.Class? klass, Android.Util.Size? size);
.method public hidebysig instance int64 GetOutputStallDuration(class Java.Lang.Class klass, class Android.Util.Size size) cil managed

Docs.param: a class which is supported by #isOutputSupportedFor(Class) and has a non-empty array returned by #getOutputSizes(Class)
Docs.summary: Get the stall duration for the class/size combination (in nanoseconds).
Docs.returns: a minimum frame duration >= 0 in nanoseconds

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Get the stall duration for the format/size combination (in nanoseconds).

Docs.summary: Get the image format output formats for a reprocessing input format.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool IsOutputSupportedFor(class Android.Views.Surface surface) cil managed

Docs.summary: Determine whether or not the surface in its current state is suitable to be included in a CameraDevice#createCaptureSession capture session as an output.
Docs.returns: true if this is supported, false otherwise

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if the Surface endpoint is no longer valid

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig bool IsOutputSupportedFor(class Java.Lang.Class klass) cil managed

Docs.summary: Determine whether or not output streams can be configured with a particular class as a consumer.
Docs.returns: true if this class is supported as an output, false otherwise

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool IsOutputSupportedFor(int32 format) cil managed

Docs.param: an image format from either ImageFormat or PixelFormat
Docs.summary: Determine whether or not output surfaces with a particular user-defined format can be passed CameraDevice#createCaptureSession createCaptureSession.
Docs.returns: true iff using a surface with this format will be supported with CameraDevice#createCaptureSession

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if the image format was not a defined named constant from either or
